Class AfficherEtModifierEquation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ica.uiElements.AfficherEtModifierEquation

  • public class AfficherEtModifierEquation
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates the components which enable the visualisation and the modification of Equation objects on the MainApplicationCanvas

    Salim Ahmed
